name: Metal Tools
description: What is the project about? Metal Tools is a complete trading suite for on-chain Ethereum trading,we have functional custom made bots running on historical uniswap swap algorithm. What makes your project unique? We have relatively the best working product for Alpha Hunting on Ethereum right now along with our trading bot coming.We are combining best of two worlds together. History of your project. Our NFT mint sold out in less than 15 mins and our project has almost 500 eth volume on Opensea as well as NFT floor being 5x of mint.We are number one trending NFT on opensea right now. Whatâ€™s next for your project? Adding more bots along with our big Trader Bot Release What can your token be used for? To gain exclusive access to our tools and earn revenue sharing.
